body.value:
Labdoo Conference Barcelona 2016 Come share your Labdoo story and learn from it!
Day: September 17th, 2016 Time: 8:30 CEST Entry fee: 15 Euros (lunch included) Reservation: attendees need to register online as there will be limited physical seats by filling in this form [to be completed]. Location: Campus Diagonal Nord. Edificio A3 C. Jordi Girona, 1-3 08034 Barcelona (GPS coordinates: 41.388353, 2.112448 | Gmaps ) International sessions with Schools and Hubs around the world: Available via videoconference through any of these channels https://hangouts.google.com/hangouts/_/labdoo.org/labdoochannel1 https://hangouts.google.com/hangouts/_/labdoo.org/labdoochannel2 https://hangouts.google.com/hangouts/_/labdoo.org/labdoochannel3
